trans-unit.source: <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> is a database engine written completely in the Java programming language. The database will run in any certified Java Virtual Machine (JVM).

seg-source.mrk: <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> is a database engine written completely in the Java programming language.
The database will run in any certified Java Virtual Machine (JVM).

target.mrk: <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> is a database engine written completely in the Java programming language.
The database will run in any certified Java Virtual Machine (JVM).

trans-unit.source: You must have a Java Development Kit (JDK) version @MINIMUM_JDK@ or higher installed on your computer. The JDK is required to perform the activities in the <xref href="cgstutorialintro.dita#cgstutorialintro"></xref>.

seg-source.mrk: You must have a Java Development Kit (JDK) version @MINIMUM_JDK@ or higher installed on your computer.
The JDK is required to perform the activities in the <xref href="cgstutorialintro.dita#cgstutorialintro"></xref>.

target.mrk: You must have a Java Development Kit (JDK) version @MINIMUM_JDK@ or higher installed on your computer.
The JDK is required to perform the activities in the <xref href="cgstutorialintro.dita#cgstutorialintro"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: To check that the correct version of the JDK is installed, issue the <codeph>java -version</codeph> command.
